definitions.title: restoration
definitions.body: (properly the new flesh that grows at the wounded spot, Ar. 0’ariykah;un; Fi:JPh xiii. 114–6, so Fl De on Is 58:8; v. also Di)—´[[א]] 2Ch 24:13, Ne 4:1; [[אֲרֻכָה]] Je 30:17, Je 33:6; cstr. [[אֲרֻכַת]] Je 8:22; [[אֲרֻכָֽתְךָ]] Is 58:8 ;—alwaysfig.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: healing, restoration of Israel Is 58:8, here c. vb. [[חָמַח]], elsewhere c. [[עָלָה]]; Je 8:22 (‖[[רָפָא]]), c. [[עָלָה]] Hiph., subj. ´[[י]], Je 30:17, Je 33:6 (‖ id.)

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: restoration of walls of temple 2Ch 24:13, of walls of Jerusalem (cf. Fi supr.) Ne 4:1 (both c. [[עלה]]).
